Monthly Fee

At storeup we value your money, Our monthly fee plan will provide you higher benifits in lower investments

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Large Units

Got too much to store? dont panic we have got the right space. Our Larger Units are perfect for your every need.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Safe Lockers

Nothing can be much safer than our safe lockers for your goods,It is just the right place to put your trust on.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Storage Tips

Confused in selecting the type of storage unit ?? dont worry our experts will help you in selecting your perfect

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_type=”full_width_bg_content” pattern=”” css=”.vc_custom_1484059220091{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;background-color: #e4ebef !important;}” padding_top=”100″ padding_bottom=”100″ bgcolor=”#f0f0f0″][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”65″ img_size=”full” style=”vc_box_shadow_border”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

What size storage unit do you need for your item?

Biggest Self Storage in the Complete USA

Storeup self storage knows that cleanliness is one of the most important considerations when selecting your self storage space. We have a team who will guide you in person who want to self store something.

  • 5'x10' Unit
  • 10'x15' Unit
  • 10'x25' Unit
5 x 10 size unit yields 24 square feet of space and are are small, but still you can store many items as they are an excellent in storing all of your items like garden tools, seasonal items, office supplies, or miscellaneous boxes etc.
10 x 15 size unit yields a total of 150 square feet of space, perfect for storing an entire bedroom or office. Are you looking to remodel a room or office? Now you can have the space to keep all of the contents during construction instead of clogging up other rooms!
With 250 square feet of space, this large unit can typically store the contents of 4 bedrooms. This space is also ideal for larger items like televisions, pianos, couches, or tables and much more.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_type=”full_width_bg_content” pattern=”” css=”.vc_custom_1467201994367{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 100px !important;}” padding_top=”100″ padding_bottom=”100″][vc_column][vc_column_text]
Value, Convenience, Security and Services

Highlights of the StoreUp Services

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Digital Goods

Store your digital goods like tv, cabinets, monitors, printers etc.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Lowest Prices

Affordable Prices ranges according to your requirements.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

24/7 Units Available

We are available round the clock for you anytime and will service better.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Safe Lockers

Keep your important documents in a safe locker with a powerful volt system.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Home Storage

Store easlily all your home needs products and small home appliances.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Car Parkings

We have car parking with safety measures for all the seasons.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_column_text]

Wine Storage

Store your wines for years and have a good taste after years.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Carton Storage

Store all your small and big carton boxes with free from termite control.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_type=”full_width_bg_content” pattern=”” bg_position=”left_top” bg_attachment=”parallax” bg_repeat=”no-repeat” img_opacity=”0.7″ css=”.vc_custom_1473429682109{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background: rgba(73,73,73,0.6) url(http://www.aivahthemes.com/wp/storeup/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2016/06/storage-bg-partial.jpg?id=69) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;*background-color: rgb(73,73,73) !important;}” bgcolor=”#000000″ bgimage=”69″ padding_top=”100″ padding_bottom=”100″ textcolor=”#ffffff”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

75 Different Size Options

1000 Plus Storage Units

Finding the competitors around you and choosing from various types of storage units can be stressful.  At Storeup Self Storage, our managers are trained by professionals listen to your needs properly for storing your personal possessions.  Regardless of whether you need economical or premium storage for personal or business needs, Storeup Self Storage offers clean units in well lighted, controlled access facilities at an affordable price range.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
